data.text: Sansi tofanyie xa lu naa, sɛɛwɛ xui xa ite.
Wo tan naxee bara gaaxu han wo bɛlɛxɛ mu se suxuma, wo xinbi fa sɛrɛn,
Wo a fala mixie bɛ naxee bara gaaxu,
Na tɛmui, dɔnxuie ya rabɔɔma nɛ, tulixɔrie fe mɛma nɛ.
Mabɛnyie tuganma nɛ alɔ xeli, boboe fan sɛɛwɛ xui raminima nɛ,
Bɔxi maxaraxi mafindima nɛ baa ra,
Kira mabama naa naxan xili falama, «Kira Sɛniyɛnxi.»
Yɛtɛe nun burunyi sube mu toma naa, fo lasiri mixi.
Alatala naxee xɔrɛyaxi, nee nan gbilenma e xɔnyi na kira xɔn ma.
